advpl-sintax.package.description: Extension of quality analysis and syntax and snippets ADVPL and facilitates the use of GIT.
advpl-sintax.commands.git.teste: advpl-sintax - Send the commits to branch the VALIDATION!
advpl-sintax.commands.git.homologacao: advpl-sintax - Send the commits to the branch of RELEASE!
advpl-sintax.commands.git.producao: advpl-sintax - Send the commits to the PRODUCTION branch!
advpl-sintax.configuration.title: Configuration of Advpl Sintax
advpl-sintax.configuration.properties.br: GIT branch name of the Test environment.
GIT branch name of the Homologation environment.
GIT branch name of the Production environment.
advpl-sintax.configuration.properties.ow: Name of the database or owner.
advpl-sintax.configuration.properties.em: Protheus business codes for query validation.
advpl-sintax.configuration.properties.co: Source comment line. (Use search TypeScript default)
